user_data.target_needs: The main need I wanted to fulfill was finding comfortable and supportive footwear that accommodates my foot and ankle issues, ensuring I can wear them for extended periods without discomfort.
purchase_reason: I purchased this product primarily due to its cushioning and comfort features, which are essential for my foot and ankle issues. However, I was also influenced by my previous experiences with older models of the brand, hoping for a similar fit. The review highlighted some concerns about the fit and support, which made me cautious but still inclined to try it out for its comfort.

The main reason for my purchase was the need for a truly supportive sneaker that could accommodate my ankle and hip issues. I relied heavily on my past experiences with this brand, which I found to be reliable and comfortable. The review reassured me about the quality and fit, which played a significant role in my decision.

I was looking for a supportive everyday sneaker based on various articles and reviews. However, my experience with this product was underwhelming, as it did not meet my expectations for arch support and comfort. The review indicated that the shoes might not be as good as advertised, which made me question my decision.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer a good fit and comfort, especially in clothing and footwear. I value features like moisture-wicking fabrics, supportive designs, and quality materials that enhance comfort during physical activities. I appreciate items that maintain their quality after washing and provide a flattering silhouette. Additionally, I tend to favor brands that have a reputation for durability and support, particularly for my specific body type and needs. On the other hand, I dislike products that do not fit as expected, especially if they are poorly constructed or made from inferior materials. I am particularly sensitive to fit issues, especially in bras and shoes, and I find it frustrating when items do not match their advertised qualities or when the sizing is inconsistent. Overall, I seek a balance of style, comfort, and functionality in my purchases.

conversation.content: I want to find comfortable and supportive footwear that can accommodate my foot and ankle issues, allowing me to wear them for extended periods without discomfort. within my expected price range: [49.99, 69.95]
What type of footwear do you typically prefer, such as sneakers, boots, sandals, or another style?
I prefer sneakers for their comfort and support, especially since I need footwear that can accommodate my foot and ankle issues.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <PAPLUS Ankle Compression Sock for Men and Women 2/4/6 Pairs, Low Cut Compression Running Sock with Ankle Support> / Item ID: B0BV9DLYS8 / Price: $12.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Active', 'Base Layers & Compression'] / Description: ['THE LATEST SERIES ANKLE COMPRESSION SOCKS PROMOTION, LIMITED-TIME DEAL', '“I tried these and they were amazing, the comfort and how thin they are but compresses on the areas of my sole that provides support is excellent.\xa0”', '“Too soon to tell on just how much they will help my plantar fasciatis but it feels like they will do wonders!\xa0”', 'Style and Confidence on Your Feet', 'Unlike normal short compression socks, PAPLUS\xa0compression socks low cut are designed with gradient compression. Our ankle length compression socks are engineered with the latest arch to below ankle compression technology, offering a targeted foot support.', 'The results are a boost in circulation, delivering an enhanced oxygen blood flow keeping you going harder, for longer, and recovering faster.', 'Features & Benefits:', '♥Improved Blood Circulation, Recovery, and Performance.\xa0Stimulates blood flow and improves oxygen delivery to your feet.', '♥Reduced Injury, Swelling, and Fatigue.\xa0Helps reduce injury and swelling – blood pooling and foot pain.', '♥Superior Construction and Comfort.\xa0Lightweight premium nylon and spandex material provide the ideal fit with breathable material. Provides for full range of motion and joint flexibility. Keeps your feet dry.', '♥Endless Uses.\xa0Pregnancy / Maternity - Walking - Jogging - Running - Yoga - Pilates - Soccer - Football - Basketball - Baseball - Ice Hockey - Field Hockey - Lacrosse', 'Cycling - Triathletes - Hiking - Skiing - Crossfit - Field Sports - Nursing - Medical - Doctor - Hospitality - Construction - Retail - Dress - Travel', '★100% Money Back Guarantee', "We are so confident that you will also be amazed with compression socks ankle, that we also give you the chance to get every penny back if you aren't!", 'What are you waiting for?\xa0 Take me home now'] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Skechers Men's Go Max-Athletic Air Mesh Slip on Walking Shoe Sneaker> / Item ID: B0BN6CCHB7 / Price: $54.97 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Shoes', 'Athletic', 'Walking'] / Description: ["Get the maximum comfort and cushioning for athletic walking with the Skechers go walk max. Mesh fabric upper with cushioned, supportive sole design. Designed with Skechers performance technology and materials specifically for athletic walking. Goga max technology insole with high-rebound cushioning. The company's success stems from it's high quality, diversified, and affordable product line that meets consumers' Various lifestyle needs. Since it's inception in 1992, the Skechers diverse product offering has grown from utility style boots to include seven Skechers brands and five uniquely branded fashion lines for men and women. Skechers is an award-winning global leader in lifestyle footwear offering shoes that appeal to trend-savvy men, women and kids everywhere. The brand's styles include the latest innovative athletic, casual and fashion sneakers as well as sandals and boots—with many collections featuring Skechers air-cooled memory foam insoles for added comfort. Plus, Skechers offers a range of slip-resistant work FOOTWEAR for men and women, as well as cool, fun, playful and lighted styles that boys and girls love. Always ahead of the fashion curve, Skechers has made its sport, casual and dress casual shoes essential to every closet.Consigue la máxima comodidad y amortiguación para caminar atlético con el Skechers GO WALK Max. Parte superior de tela de malla con diseño de suela acolchada. Diseñado con tecnología de rendimiento Skechers y materiales específicamente para caminar atlético. Plantilla de tecnología Goga Max con amortiguación de alto rebote. El éxito de la compañía se deriva de su línea de productos de alta calidad, diversificada y asequible que satisface las diversas necesidades de estilo de vida de los consumidores. Desde su creación en 1992, la oferta diversa de productos Skechers ha crecido desde botas de estilo utilitario para incluir siete marcas Skechers y cinco líneas de moda de marca única para hombres y mujeres. Skechers es un líder mundial galardonado en calzado de estilo"] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Skechers Men's Gowalk 5 Demitasse Sneaker> / Item ID: B086HNS4M1 / Price: $64.95 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Shoes', 'Athletic', 'Walking'] / Description: ['Driven by innovation as a part of The Comfort Technology Company, Skechers Performance footwear is inspired by athletes and offers unmatched comfort and lightweight materials across a range of products for walking, running, golf and more. From everyday casual slip-ons for a morning stroll to serious running shoes that will help you compete, footwear for the golf course or pickleball court, rugged boots for outdoor adventures—Skechers Performance offers a complete range of comfortable options to support any active lifestyle', 'GO WALK 5 – ATHLETIC WORKOUT WALKING SHOES', 'DETAILS:', '✔ Lightweight, responsive Ultra Go cushioning✔ Lace-up walking shoe design✔ Skechers Air Cooled Goga Mat breathable insole provides high-rebound cushioning✔ High-rebound COMFORT PILLAR TECHNOLOGY underfoot reacts to your every step for the ultimate comfort✔ Dual density outsole for added stability and support✔ Machine Washable - easy to clean', 'CONSTRUCTION:', '★ Breathable athletic mesh upper with a lace-up front★ Durable traction outsole for stability★ Heel panel with Quick-Fit portal★ Skechers GOwalk logo detail★ Soft padded collar and tongue for supreme comfort']

The <Skechers Men's Go Walk Max-54601 Sneaker> seems to offer the comfort and cushioning I look for in sneakers to support my foot and ankle issues effectively. The <Skechers Men's Max Cushioning Elite-Performance Walking & Running Shoe Sneaker> (B08BH27G8W) offers additional cushioned comfort and response to your runs and walks on an ULTRA GO cushioned platform. With features like a Virtually seamless engineered mesh fabric upper for breathability, a Cushioned responsive ULTRA GO comfort platform, and an Air Cooled Goga Mat insole for shock absorption and support, these sneakers provide the extra comfort and support you seek for your foot and ankle issues. The lightweight, durable, and flexible parametric web outsole ensures multi-surface traction and promotes flexibility, making them ideal for extended wear. Priced at $89.95, these sneakers are a premium choice that ensures both comfort and durability over time.
